-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                 Release Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
     

If you want cutting edge discussion of where the main thrust of the exopolitics field is heading 
-  look no further than the annual Exopolitics "X" Conference staged by the ParadigmResearchGroup 
in Washington. It's rare to get such authors and researchers in one room so it's worth taking the 
time out to watch the discussion a few times.

Thanks to the Denmark national group you can now see this session below in two parts. 
The panel includes Rob Simone, CB Scott Jones, Robert Emmenegger, Grant Cameron, 
Victor Viggiani, Richard Dolan and more. Hosted by Stephen Bassett and Cheryl Jones.

The UN document mentioned by the Canadian disclosure group can be found here: <a href="
http://www.exopolitics.org.uk/index.php?searchword=33%2F4&option=com_search&Itemid=" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.exopolitics.org.uk/index.php?searchword=33%2F4&option=com_search&Itemid=</a>
